FilterTypeUsersTitle.description: The title of the filter type used for users (plural, upper-case).

FilterTypeUsersName.description: The name of the filter type used for users (singlular, lower-case).

FilterTypeUsersLabelNone.message: You have not filtered any users yet.
FilterTypeUsersLabelNone.description: The message displayed when the user does not have any filtered users.

FilterTypeUsersLabelHelp.message: You can manually filter users by entering their username below, or while browsing by clicking the red 'x' that appears on thumbnails when you hover over them.
FilterTypeUsersLabelHelp.description: The message displayed to help the user filter new users.
